Posted By: SarcasmElemental (10/24/2012 8:00:12 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Wow, everybody hates on this card so much. Sure, it's no [Sol Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sol Ring), but what is? Yes, [Thran Dynamo](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thran Dynamo) is better. But seriously, why not play them all? I have a pretty sweet [Kozilek, Butcher of Truth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kozilek, Butcher of Truth) EDH deck, where ramping is essential, and I play all of the above. I also run the functionally identical [Ur-Golem's Eye](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ur-Golem's Eye), and frankly, I wish there were even *more* of them! Solid card.
posts.html:
Wow, everybody hates on this card so much. Sure, it's no Sol Ring, but what is? Yes, Thran Dynamo is better. But seriously, why not play them all? I have a pretty sweet Kozilek, Butcher of Truth EDH deck, where ramping is essential, and I play all of the above. I also run the functionally identical Ur-Golem's Eye, and frankly, I wish there were even more of them! Solid card.
